summary: Gabon is a country in Central Africa, located on the Atlantic coast and the equator. It's surrounded by Equatorial Guinea, Cameroon, the Republic of the Congo, and the Gulf of Guinea. With an area of 270,000 square kilometers and a population of 2.3 million, its capital is Libreville. Originally inhabited by pygmies, Bantu migrants settled there in the 14th century. Independent from France since 1960, Gabon has had three presidents and introduced a multi-party system in the 1990s. Despite being a developing country, it's one of Africa's wealthiest, with French as the official language and Christianity as the main religion.
title: Gabon
